chapters.title: The Sand of Intelligence
chapters.description: Discover how ordinary sand contains the secret ingredient for computer chips

narration.text: Hi there! I'm Silico, your silicon guide! ðŸŒŸ Somewhere in the vast deserts of Earth lies the mind of your next computer...
This shiny crystal you see is quartz - it contains silicon, the most important ingredient of every computer chip on Earth!
But not all rocks contain pure silicon. Let's learn to identify the right ones! Ready for your first challenge?

game.name: Quartz Sorter
game.description: Sort pure quartz crystals from other rocks using drag & drop

chapters.title: The Great Purification
chapters.description: Learn how raw silicon is purified in massive furnaces

narration.text: Great job finding those quartz crystals! Now we need to extract pure silicon from them. This happens in giant furnaces!
The furnace heats up to over 2000Â°C! That's hot enough to melt copper! We mix the quartz with carbon to create a chemical reaction.
Your job is to control the temperature and timing. Too hot or too cold, and the process fails!

game.name: Furnace Controller
game.description: Control furnace temperature and valves to purify silicon

chapters.title: Growing the Perfect Crystal
chapters.description: Watch as molten silicon grows into perfect crystal structures

narration.text: Excellent temperature control! Now we have molten silicon. But we need it in perfect crystal form for computer chips.
We use a special process called the Czochralski method. A tiny seed crystal is dipped into molten silicon and slowly pulled up.
The crystal must rotate at just the right speed while being pulled. Too fast or slow, and the crystal structure breaks!

game.name: Crystal Grower
game.description: Control rotation speed and pulling rate to grow perfect silicon crystals

chapters.title: Slicing the Silicon Wafer
chapters.description: Cut the crystal into thin wafers - the foundation of all chips

narration.text: Perfect! You've grown a beautiful silicon crystal, called an ingot. Now we need to slice it into thin wafers.
Each wafer is thinner than a human hair! We use diamond-wire saws because silicon is very hard to cut.
After cutting, each wafer must be polished to mirror perfection. Even tiny scratches can ruin a computer chip!

game.name: Wafer Slicer
game.description: Slice silicon ingots and polish wafers to perfection

chapters.title: Building Logic Gates
chapters.description: Create the basic building blocks of computer logic

narration.text: Now we have perfect silicon wafers! Time to build logic gates - the basic elements that make computers think.
Logic gates are like tiny switches that can be ON or OFF. We create them by adding special materials to specific areas of the wafer.
Using photolithography, we shine light through masks to create patterns. It's like using stencils, but incredibly precise!

game.name: Gate Designer
game.description: Arrange gate masks to complete logic gate designs

chapters.title: Connecting the Brain
chapters.description: Wire up logic gates to create computational circuits

narration.text: Great work creating those logic gates! Now we need to connect them together to make circuits that can actually compute.
When we connect AND, OR, and NOT gates in different ways, we can create an ALU - Arithmetic Logic Unit - the calculator inside every processor!
Let's build a simple ALU that can add numbers. Connect the gates correctly and watch the magic happen!

game.name: Circuit Builder
game.description: Connect logic gates to build working computational circuits

chapters.title: Programming the Silicon Brain
chapters.description: Write your first program for the silicon chip you helped create

narration.text: Amazing! You've built a working processor! Now let's program it to solve problems. This is where silicon truly becomes a 'brain'.
Programs are just sequences of instructions that tell the processor what to do. Let's start with simple commands like 'add' and 'store'.
You'll drag and drop code blocks to create a program. Watch how your silicon creation follows your instructions perfectly!

game.name: Code Builder
game.description: Create programs using drag-and-drop code blocks

chapters.title: The Silicon Revolution
chapters.description: Celebrate your journey and see how silicon powers our modern world

narration.text: Congratulations! You've completed the incredible journey from sand to silicon brain! Let's see what you've accomplished.
The silicon chip you helped create is now the brain of smartphones, computers, cars, and even space rockets!
From a grain of sand to the most important technology of our time - you've witnessed the silicon revolution! Ready for your certificate?

game.name: Knowledge Quiz
game.description: Test your understanding of the silicon chip creation process
